module.name: org.opencms.ade.config
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module chacc '/system/userimages/' 'ROLE' 'ELEMENT_AUTHOR' '+I+O+R'
module.description:
Configuration for OpenCms websites.
© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.blog
module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template blog extension.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.contact
module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template contact information extension.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.core
module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template core module contains the main template and essential resource types.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.democontents
module.import-script:
writeProperty '/' 'Title' 'Demo Site' writeProperty '/' 'Description' 'The OpenCms demo, brought to you by Alkacon Software.' writeProperty '/' 'NavText' 'Overview' writeProperty '/' 'template' '/system/modules/org.opencms.apollo/templates/apollo-page.jsp' writeProperty '/' 'apollo.css.wrapper' 'bg-blue:Blue background|bg-red:Red background|bg-grey-light:Grey background|bo-left-2 bo-red p-0 pl-10:Red line left|bo-right-1 bo-grey p-0 pr-5:Grey line right' writeProperty '/' 'apollo.css.iconbox' 'bg-grey-lighter:%(key.apollo.setting.cssclass.lightbox)|bg-red bo-radius-20:%(key.apollo.setting.cssclass.redbox)' writeProperty '/' 'apollo.title.prefix' 'OpenCms |'
createUser 'Author' 'password' 'Sample author user' addUserToGroup 'Author' 'Users' addUserToRole 'Author' 'ELEMENT_AUTHOR'
createUser 'Editor' 'password' 'Sample editor user' addUserToGroup 'Editor' 'Users' addUserToRole 'Editor' 'EDITOR'
createUser 'Gallator' 'password' 'Sample user who can edit categories and galleries' addUserToGroup 'Gallator' 'Users' addUserToRole 'Gallator' 'CATEGORY_EDITOR' addUserToRole 'Gallator' 'GALLERY_EDITOR'
createUser 'Demo' 'password' 'Sample user with workplace access permissions' addUserToGroup 'Demo' 'Users' addUserToRole 'Demo' 'WORKPLACE_USER'
createUser 'Templator' 'password' 'Sample user with template development permissions' addUserToGroup 'Templator' 'Users' addUserToRole 'Templator' 'DEVELOPER'
touchResource '/system/modules/org.opencms.apollo/formatters'
module.description: The OpenCms 10.5.4 Apollo template demo contents.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.job
module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template job advertisement extension.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.linksequence

module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template extension for social media buttons using Shariff.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.sitemap
module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template sitemap extension.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.template.slider

module.description: The OpenCms 10 Apollo template complex slider extension.

module.name: org.opencms.apollo.theme
module.description: Contains the default Apollo CSS, JavaScript and resources.

module.name: org.opencms.editors
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/editors/' 'cache' 'false' chacc '/system/workplace/editors/' 'GROUP' 'ALL_OTHERS' '+I+O' chacc '/system/workplace/editors/' 'ROLE' 'ELEMENT_AUTHOR' '+I+O+R+V'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Common Editing tools.

This module is needed to be able to edit files in the OpenCms Workplace.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.editors.codemirror
module.description:
This module adds the Open Source text editor CodeMirror to the OpenCms Workplace.

Install this module if you want a source code editor with syntax highlighting. The version of CodeMirror is 5.37.0.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.editors.tinymce
module.description:
This module contains TinyMCE editor for HTML pages and XML content.

The version of TinyMCE is 4.7.12

module.name: org.opencms.gwt
module.description:
Provides an OpenCms GWT framework.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.jquery
module.description: This modules includes the jQuery javascript libraries as well as several plugins used by OpenCms

module.name: org.opencms.jsp.search
module.nicename: Solr search form support for JSPs
module.description:
Exposes a configuration content that can be used to configure search forms

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.locale.cs
module.nicename: OpenCms 10 Czech localization for the workplace
module.description: OpenCms Localization

module.name: org.opencms.locale.da
module.nicename: OpenCms 10 Danish localization for the workplace
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/da/' 'content-encoding' 'ISO-8859-1' writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/da/' 'locale' 'da'
module.description:
This module contains the Danish language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the Danish version of the OpenCms Workplace.

© 2018 by CodeDroids ApS (http://www.codedroids.dk).

module.name: org.opencms.locale.de
module.nicename: OpenCms 10 German localization for the workplace
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/de/' 'content-encoding' 'ISO-8859-1' writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/de/' 'locale' 'de'
module.description:

Install this module if you want to use the german version of the OpenCms Workplace.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.locale.es
module.nicename: OpenCms 10 Spanish localization for the workplace
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/es/' 'content-encoding' 'ISO-8859-1'

This module contains the Spanish language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the Spanish version of the OpenCms Workplace.

module.description:
This module contains the Italian language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the Italian version of the OpenCms Workplace.

© 2018 by Coranto Informatica di Antonio Cordeddu (http://www.coranto.it).

module.description: OpenCms Localization

module.name: org.opencms.locale.zh
module.nicename: OpenCms 10.5 Chinese localization for the workplace
module.import-script: writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/zh/' 'content-encoding' 'ISO-8859-1' writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/zh/' 'locale' 'zh'
module.description:
This module contains the Chinese language localization files for the OpenCms workplace.

Install this module if you want to use the chinese version of the OpenCms Workplace.

; 2016 http://www.scnjw.gov.cn).

This module is base upon opencms 9.0.1 chinese localization,it is the ressult of add new keys for 10.5 and delete unused keys
module.authorname: Rural Economic Information Center of SiChuan ,Tang liang zhao

module.name: org.opencms.ugc
module.description:
User generated content API

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module chacc '/system/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+R' chacc '/system/modules/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+R+V' writeProperty '/system/shared/' 'export' 'false' writeProperty '/system/workplace/' 'content-encoding' 'UTF-8' writeProperty '/system/workplace/' 'export' 'false' writeProperty '/system/workplace/' 'login-form' '/system/login/index.html' chacc '/system/workplace/' 'GROUP' 'ALL_OTHERS' '+I+O' chacc '/system/workplace/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+O+R+V' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/notification/' 'Title' 'Content Notification' writeProperty '/system/workplace/commons/' 'cache' 'false' writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/de/' 'content-encoding' 'ISO-8859-1' writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/de/' 'locale' 'de' writeProperty '/system/workplace/locales/en/' 'locale' 'en' # create folders for categories, galleries and views createFolder '/system/' 'categories' createFolder '/system/' 'galleries' createFolder '/system/galleries/' 'download' writeProperty '/system/galleries/download/' 'exportname' 'download' createFolder '/system/galleries/' 'externallinks' writeProperty '/system/galleries/externallinks/' 'export' 'false' createFolder '/system/galleries/' 'pics' writeProperty '/system/galleries/pics/' 'exportname' 'pics' createFolder '/system/workplace/' 'views' writeProperty '/system/workplace/views/' 'cache' 'false' chacc '/system/workplace/views/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+O+R+V'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace base files.

It includes common used dialogs and style sheets, that are needed by any workplace module.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.administration
module.description:
This module contains the base components for the administration view.

Its allows you to install and/or develop administration tools for OpenCms.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.explorer
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/explorer/' 'Title' 'Explorer Tools' writeProperty '/system/workplace/explorer/' 'cache' 'bypass' writeProperty '/system/workplace/explorer/' 'default-file' '/system/workplace/views/explorer/explorer_files.jsp?mode=explorerview&reload=true'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace Explorer.

Install this module if you want a GUI to work on the OpenCms VFS.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.handler
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms Workplace handler files.

It includes the 404 and 500 error handlers that are showed in case of an error of a frontend application.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.spellcheck
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms spellcheck dictionaries.

© 2013 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.accounts
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_ACCOUNTS_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'NavImage' 'tools/accounts/icons/big/accounts.png:tools/accounts/icons/small/accounts.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_ACCOUNTS_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'NavPos' '20.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_ACCOUNTS_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'Title' 'Accounts Management' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.accounts.CmsAccountsToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' chacc '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+O' chacc '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/' 'ROLE' 'ACCOUNT_MANAGER' '+I+O+R+V' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_IMEXPORT_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'NavImage' 'tools/accounts/icons/big/imexport.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_IMEXPORT_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'NavPos' '7.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_IMEXPORT_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'Title' 'Im-/Export User Data' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'admintoolhandler-args' 'params:oufqn=${param.oufqn}&action=initial|path:/accounts/orgunit/imexport' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/accounts/imexport_user_data/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.accounts.CmsAccountsToolHandler'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the user accounts and groups.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.cache
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_CACHE_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'NavImage' 'tools/cache/icons/big/cache.png:tools/cache/icons/small/cache.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_CACHE_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'NavPos' '100.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_CACHE_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'Title' 'Cache Administration' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/cache/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.cache.CmsCacheAdminToolHandler'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the different internal caches.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.content
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_CONTENTTOOLS_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'NavImage' 'tools/contenttools/icons/big/contenttools.png:tools/contenttools/icons/small/contenttools.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_CONTENTTOOLS_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'NavPos' '110.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_CONTENTTOOLS_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'Title' 'Content Tools' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.content.CmsContentToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_CHECKCONTENT_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'NavImage' 'tools/contenttools/icons/big/contentcheck.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_CHECKCONTENT_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'NavPos' '1.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_CHECKCONTENT_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'Title' 'Content Check' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.content.CmsPropertyContentToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_CHECKCONTENT_CONFIGURATION_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'NavImage' 'tools/contenttools/icons/big/contentcheck_configuration.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_CHECKCONTENT_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'NavPos' '2.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_CHECKCONTENT_CONFIGURATION_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'Title' 'plugins' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'admintoolhandler-args' 'path:/contenttools/checkconfig' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.content.CmsPropertyContentToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'locale' 'en' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/contenttools/check/plugin/' 'locale-available' 'en'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the content of resources.

Install this module if you want to modify file properties or content elements.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.database
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_DATABASE_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'NavImage' 'tools/database/icons/big/database_manage.png:tools/database/icons/small/database_manage.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_DATABASE_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'NavPos' '30.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_DATABASE_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'Title' 'Database Management' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/database/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.database.CmsDatabaseToolHandler'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms database maintainance tools.

Install this module if you want to import/export data, it also contains a static export tool.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_manage.png:tools/galleryoverview/icons/small/gal_manage.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavPos' '60.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'Title' 'Gallery Overview' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.CmsDefaultToolHandler'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_DOWNLOAD_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_download.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_DOWNLOAD_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavPos' '1.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_DOWNLOAD_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'Title' 'Download Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/downloadgallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_HTML_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_html.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_HTML_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavPos' '2.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_HTML_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'Title' 'Html Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/htmlgallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_IMAGE_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_image.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_IMAGE_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavPos' '3.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_IMAGE_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'Title' 'Image Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/imagegallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_link.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavPos' '4.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'Title' 'Link Gallery' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/linkgallery/' 'internal' '4'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_TABLE_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavImage' 'tools/galleryoverview/icons/big/gal_table.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_TABLE_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavPos' '5.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_GALLERIES_TABLE_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'Title' 'Content Check' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.galleryoverview.CmsGalleriesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/galleryoverview/tablegallery/' 'internal' '5'
module.description:
This module contains Overviews for every OpenCms gallery types.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.git
module.description:
The module adds a git repository binding to the workplace tools.
You can configure a git repository and a set of modules that should be controlled by that repository.
The module allows you to check in the latest version of your modules by simply pressing one button.
NOTE: Currently only Linux systems are supported.

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.history
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'NavImage' 'tools/history/icons/big/history.png:tools/history/icons/small/history.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'NavPos' '50.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'Title' 'File History' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.history.CmsFileHistoryToolHandler'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_CLEARHISTORY_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'NavImage' 'tools/history/icons/big/history_clear.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_CLEARHISTORY_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'NavPos' '12.5' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_CLEARHISTORY_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.history.CmsFileHistoryToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/clearhistory/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_HISTORYSETTINGS_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'NavImage' 'tools/history/icons/big/history_settings.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_HISTORYSETTINGS_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'NavPos' '0.5' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_HISTORYSETTINGS_HISTORY_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.history.CmsFileHistoryToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/history/settings/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for managing the file history feature.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.link
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'NavImage' 'tools/linkvalidation/icons/big/link.png:tools/linkvalidation/icons/small/link.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_MODULES_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'NavPos' '51.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_LINK_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'Title' 'Link Checking' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.CmsDefaultToolHandler'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_EXTERNALLINK_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'NavImage' 'tools/linkvalidation/icons/big/link_extern.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_EXTERNALLINK_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'NavPos' '3' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_EXTERNALLINK_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'Title' 'Check External Links' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/linkvalidation/external/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.link.CmsLinkValidationToolHandler'
module.description:
This module contains the OpenCms administration tools for validating links in xml documents and pointer links.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.modules
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_MODULES_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'NavImage' 'tools/modules/icons/big/modules.png:tools/modules/icons/small/modules.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_MODULES_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'NavPos' '30.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_MODULES_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'Title' 'Module Management' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.modules.CmsModulesToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/modules/reports/' 'Title' 'Reports'
module.description:
This module contains administration tools for managing the OpenCms modules.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.projects
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_PROJECTS_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'NavImage' 'tools/projects/icons/big/projects.png:tools/projects/icons/small/projects.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_PROJECTS_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'NavPos' '10.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_PROJECTS_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'Title' 'Project Management' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.projects.CmsProjectsToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/projects/' 'default-file' 'projects_list.jsp'

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.scheduler
module.import-script: # sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_JOBS_ADMIN_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'NavImage' 'tools/scheduler/icons/big/scheduler.png:tools/scheduler/icons/small/scheduler.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_JOBS_ADMIN_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'NavPos' '90.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_JOBS_ADMIN_TOOL_SHORTNAME_0}:${key.GUI_JOBS_ADMIN_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'Title' 'Scheduler Management' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.scheduler.CmsSchedulerToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/scheduler/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.searchindex
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'Description' '${key.admin.searchindex.description}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'NavImage' 'tools/searchindex/icons/big/searchindex.png:tools/searchindex/icons/small/searchindex.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'NavInfo' '${key.admin.view.groups.searchindex}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'NavPos' '80.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_NAVTEXT_SEARCHINDEX_SHORT_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'Title' 'Search Index' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.searchindex.CmsSearchToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'Description' '' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'NavImage' '' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'NavInfo' '' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'NavPos' '' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'NavText' '' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'Title' 'Source search' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'admintoolhandler-class' '' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/searchindex/sourcesearch/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
module.description:
This module contains tools related to the search capabilities of OpenCms.

Install this module if you need search capabilities in OpenCms.

© 2018 by Alkacon Software GmbH & Co. KG (http://www.alkacon.com).

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.sites

module.name: org.opencms.workplace.tools.workplace
module.import-script:
# sets access control entries and properties on folders not exclusively belonging to this module writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_TOOL_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'NavImage' 'tools/workplace/icons/big/workplace.png:tools/workplace/icons/small/workplace.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_TOOL_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'NavPos' '120.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_TOOL_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'Title' 'Workplace management tools' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.workplace.CmsWorkplaceToolHandler'
chacc '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+O' chacc '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'ROLE' 'ADMINISTRATOR' '+I+O+R+V'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_LOGVIEW_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'NavImage' 'tools/workplace/icons/big/fileview_view.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_BASIC_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'NavPos' '3.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_LOGVIEW_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'Title' 'View log file' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.workplace.CmsWorkplaceToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logfileview/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
chacc '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'ROLE' 'WORKPLACE_USER' '+I+O' chacc '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'ROLE' 'ADMINISTRATOR' '+I+O+R+V'
writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'Description' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_LOGGING_HELP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'NavImage' 'tools/workplace/icons/big/log_preferences.png' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'NavInfo' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_BASIC_GROUP_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'NavPos' '4.0' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'NavText' '${key.GUI_WORKPLACE_LOGGING_NAME_0}' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'Title' 'View log set' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'admintoolhandler-class' 'org.opencms.workplace.tools.workplace.CmsWorkplaceToolHandler' writeProperty '/system/workplace/admin/workplace/logging/' 'default-file' 'index.jsp'
